name: custom-elements-everywhere
description: Compare how different frameworks handle Web Components.

scripts.install-all: npm i && npm run install-docs && npm run install-angular && npm run install-angularjs && npm run install-canjs && npm run install-metaljs && npm run install-moon && npm run install-preact && npm run install-react && npm run install-vue && npm run install-dojo2 && npm run install-hyperhtml && npm run install-karma-plugins && npm run install-webcomponents
scripts.build: rm -rf docs/libraries; npm run build-angular & npm run build-angularjs & npm run build-canjs & npm run build-metaljs & npm run build-moon & npm run build-preact & npm run build-react & npm run build-vue & npm run build-dojo2 & npm run build-hyperhtml & wait; kill $(jobs -p); cd docs && npm run build && echo 'Site built successfully!'
